ComicInfo.Summary:
"March of the Mammoth" (7 pages) written by Jack Harris, penciled and inked by Alfredo Alcala and colored by Adrienne Roy."The Cold War" (3 pages) written by Paul Kupperberg, penciled and inked by George Evans, colored by Adrienne Roy and lettered by Todd Klein."Dead Image" (6 pages) written by Bill Kelley, penciled and inked by Ric Estrada and colored by Jerry Serpe.Notes:
This issue contains the Hostess Superhero Ad, Superman in "The Ionic Storm".Bill Kelley is a pseudonym for Murray Boltinoff.
